member.name: P:Syncfusion.SfPdfViewer.XForms.PageChangedEventArgs.IsFirstPage
member.summary: Returns true, if the new updated page number is the first page of the , otherwise false.
member.value: A boolean which represents whether the current page is the first page of the document or not.
